oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: The Writers Night Of Your Dreams
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Monroe, Bill, 1911-1996; Cartwright, Lionel; DiPiero, Bob; Robbins, Dennis; Ian, Janis; Salley, Jerry; Loudermilk, John D.; Welch, Kevin; Mattea, Kathy; Henry, Don; Dalton, Lacy J.; Carpenter, Mary Chapin, 1958-; Shafer, Whitey; Woodcuts (prints);
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: One color window card (blue on gray) announcing the Writers Night of Your Dreams featuring Bill Monroe, Chuck Burns, Lionel Cartwright, From Billy Hill, John Scott Sherrill, Bob DiPiero, Dennis Robbins, Janis Ian, Jerry Salley, John D. Loudermilk, Kevin Welch, Kathy Mattea with Jon Vezner and Don Henry, Lacy J. Dalton, Mary Chapin Carpenter, Whitey Shafer, and Crook and Chase at the Vanderbilt Plaza Ballroom on March 16. Poster features woodcuts of stars and shapes.
